text: It's too early to tell for me. I'll have to update or build a new bigger flow to see how it works out. I think that I use if for replacing nodes without removing the connections/lines/wires. And also being able to be able to connect 2 different nodes by dragging the connected endpoint to a different node is something I look forward to. I'll keep you posted :slightly_smiling_face:
